function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of clear and reliable information about the disease and control measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate alternatives for mass religious gatherings","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical distancing and isolation strategies in congested areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance and unrest due to externally imposed restrictions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community-led development practices may facilitate spread of covid-19 due to in-person contact with high-risk groups.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and rumors spread through radio and social media may foster confusion, distrust, or panic within the community.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective settlement-wide quarantines during the ebola outbreak led to violence and were ultimately abandoned.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stigma associated with contracting covid-19 and social distancing messages exacerbating social marginalization.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"States of emergency and ’emergency thinking’ may preclude locally led and adapted responses, hindering effectiveness and harm reduction.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Precarious position of migrant workers","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Breakdown in social protection due to school closures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High risk of virus exposure for people with disabilities due to reliance on others and limited ability to self-isolate.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in accessing services and information for displaced people living in informal settlements.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender-specific impacts, including increased caring burdens for women and girls, uneven earning potential, and higher exposure risk for female health workers.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insecurity and threats of eviction for tenants in informal settlements, exacerbated by the pandemic.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated spread of virus due to population fleeing or traveling under the radar","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to food due to movement restrictions and closure of markets and food vendors","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systemic vulnerabilities in informal settlements including health, social, natural, and infrastructural issues","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited livelihoods and savings may lead to economic vulnerability and inability to access vital resources like water.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Haphazard health seeking behavior in severe disease cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of inadequate or inappropriate care at hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear of seeking care due to messaging about no cure for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"People working through illness due to need to make a living","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited ventilation increasing transmission risk","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to water and handwashing facilities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of undetected and poorly managed chronic conditions in communities, increasing the risk of large numbers of people being at risk.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evidence on social and environmental transmission dynamics, leading to uncertainty in understanding and mitigating transmission vulnerability.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population and housing density in informal settlements leading to increased opportunities for social mixing and limited options for physical distancing.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High prevalence of chronic conditions in informal settlements","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly documented disease burdens and reliance on informal healthcare providers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental factors increasing the risk of respiratory diseases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on informal settlements and the novelty of the disease","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Epidemiological vulnerability to covid-19, especially for those over 70 years of age and with underlying health conditions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential gender differences in infection rates, with men being almost twice as likely to die as women","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal settlements with inadequate infrastructure and services","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restrictive control measures may not be sustainable","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Swift action needed before widespread transmission in lmic cities takes hold","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Organizational challenges of epidemic control require meaningful local involvement","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited infrastructure in informal urban settlements","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data about informal settlements prior to and during emergencies","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inappropriate responses to disease outbreaks in informal settlements","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal urban settlements with limited access to healthcare may experience a rapid spread of contagious diseases due to overcrowding and inadequate sanitation.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of official recognition and support for informal settlements may result in limited access to healthcare resources and public health interventions.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to essential services such as water and space","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of accurate and timely information about covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying solely on digital technology for pandemic policy and response may lead to a false sense of security.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal access to digital technology may exacerbate disparities in pandemic response and containment.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socioeconomic inequalities and healthcare disparities amplified by digital health initiatives.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy infringement and increased risk among individuals with mental illness or restricted access to necessities.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid diagnosis and risk prediction of covid-19 through ai and machine learning algorithms","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"}]}
